title: Reformhaus Bacher - Frankfurter
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Italian, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, German
description: German organic health food shops also known as Reformhaus. Has vegetarian and vegan health foods, vitamins, fresh fruit and vegetables, bread, and supplements. You'll find plant-based milk, tofu, seitan, tempeh, soy yoghurt, and also gluten-free products.
